loans.name: Leonardo

texts.es: Leonardo es trabajador en una empresa pública, pero también es artesano confeccionista: confecciona chamarras con la ayuda de su esposa. El crédito lo requiere para la compra de materia prima como ser tela de diversas texturas, cierres, forros, etc. Leonardo vive en casa propia la misma queda ubicada en la zona Tacagua  en la ciudad de La Paz; es casado y tiene dos hijos. Es la primera vez que obtiene el crédito en IMPRO deseando hacer crecer su negocio.
texts.en:
Leonardo works for a public entity but is also a craftsman: he makes jackets with help from his wife.  He needs the loan to buy raw materials like fabrics in various textures, zippers, lining, etc.  

Leonardo lives in his own house located in the city of La Paz’s Tacagua zone.  He’s married and has two children.  This is the first time he’s gotten an IMPRO loan wishing to make his business grow.

loans.use: to buy fabric, lining, zippers, etc. for his jacket making business.

loans.name: Amadu

texts.en:
Amadu is 41 years old and married with three children, aged between 4 years and 15 years. He runs a general merchandise store in Goderich, in the western area in Freetown, Sierra Leone. He has two children that are currently attending school and also takes care of four relatives at home. 

Amadu has been in this business for 15 years and sells batteries, sugar, milk, butter, cigarettes, mayonnaise and soap at his store. His wife is a petty trader (she sells small goods in the market), and she also contributes to the household income.  He says that the main challenge to his business is lack of sufficient capital to invest in his store.

He requested this loan through BRAC Sierra Leone to purchase more general merchandise. Amadu says that the extra income from this loan will help him educate his children. In the future, he would like to open more outlets in the community.

loans.use: To purchase more batteries, sugar, cigarettes, butter and mayonnaise.

loans.name: Gladys

texts.en: Gladys lives in Kampala, Uganda. She is single with one child who goes to school. She doesn’t take care of additional family member. She operates a food stall at the market. Her other source of income is from dry cleaning services. She has been in this business for the last five years.  She works seven days a week. She has requested for a loan of 300,000 UGX from MCDT SACCO to buy Irish potatoes, bananas, cassava, tomatoes and onions. Her goals and aspirations are to own a fully stocked stall and to buy a plot of land.  Her major business challenges are defaulters and the rainy season. She lives in a rented house and the family has access to electricity but does not have access to piped water. Her monthly expenses include medication and rent

loans.use: to buy Irish potatoes, bananas, cassava, tomatoes and onions.

loans.name: Milenka Yamile

texts.es: La señora Milenka es también socia integrante del banco de emprendimiento se dedica a la confección de overoles térmicos (panocas), buzos y chamarras deportivas, fundas para living y también cortinas, la actividad lo desarrolla en  el mismo domicilio vive con su esposo y sus dos hijos  ella vive en la casa de sus papas, su esposo trabaja un una microempresa  como confeccionista de ropa  el crédito esta destinado a la compra de una maquina bordadora y compra de rollos de tela para la confección de  deportivos, panocas y fundas de living. Vive en la zona de Achachicala con su esposo y sus hijos,  mas adelante tienen planificado realizar la construcción de la casa de su Mamá en departamentos para tener mas espacio y así poder comprar mas maquinas de costura y otros para ampliar la variedad de confección de todo tipo de prendas.
texts.en: Señora Milenka is also an integral member of the communal bank. She makes thermal overalls (overcoats), sweat shirts and sports jackets, covers for living rooms and also curtains. She carries out this work in her own home where she lives with her husband and 2 children. She lives in her parents house. Her husband works in a small business making clothes. The loan will be used to buy an embroidering machine and bolts of fabric to make sports jackets, overcoats and living room covers. She lives in the Achachicala area with her husband and children. In the future they plan to build onto her mother's house in stages so as to have more room and thus buy more sewing machines and other types of machine to expand the range of clothes manufactured to include all types of garments.

loans.use: to buy an embroidery machine and bolts of fabric.

loans.name: Esther Maria

texts.es: Esther de 57 años de edad tiene dos hijos en las edades de 29 y 31 años.  Su negocio que lleva su propio nombre,  nació una vez hizo un curso de modistería; ella solo confeccionaba para ella y para sus hijos, pero gradualmente cuando la situación económica lo requirió, decidió trabajar confeccionando a la medida entre vecinos y amigos, quienes fueron su primera clientela doméstica, la que gradualmente fue incrementándose con los referidos de sus propios compradores, logrando ingresos que le ayudaron a sacar a sus hijos adelante; en la actualidad ambos son profesionales de la enfermería y la radiología y de eso se siente muy feliz y orgullosa por haber cumplido el  sueño de verlos convertidos en personas exitosas y al servicio de la sociedad. En la actualidad está aplicando a su primer credikiva, treceavo  financiamiento que tiene con la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, organización con la cual ha desarrollado la infraestructura técnica de su negocio  y con ello ha mejorado su nivel económico.  Con su credikiva comprará materias primas e insumos como telas, correderas, adornos, pues está preparándose para responder a las primeras comuniones de muchos niños cuyas madres prefieren  que Esther confeccione los vestidos de sus hijos.
texts.en: Esther is 57 years old and has 2 children, 29 and 31 years old. Her business bears her name and was born once she had taken a dressmaking course; she only used to sew for herself and her children but gradually when the economic situation required it, she decided to work individually tailoring clothes for friends and neighbours who made up her first domestic customer base. This gradually increased with referrals from her very own customers, giving her an income which helped her take care of her children. Currently both children are professionals in the healthcare sectors of nursing and radiology and she is very happy and proud of this fact of fulfilling the dream of seeing them turned into successful people in the service of society. Currently she is applying for her first Kiva loan, the 13th funding she has with the Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, an organisation with which she has developed the technical infrastructure of her business and improved her economic standing. With her Kiva loan she will buy raw materials and consumables such as fabric.,sliders, ornaments, as she is getting ready for the first communions of many children whose mothers prefer that Esther make their children's dresses.

loans.use: to buy raw materials and consumables such as fabric, sliders and ornaments.

loans.name: Cesar

texts.es: César de 49 años de edad, tiene 7 hijos, pero por problemas con su pareja, se separaron. Ahora él vive solo, en una casa propia en el distrito de San Pedro de Cajas. A pesar de los problemas familiares, César sigue con trabajo, que es la artesanía, en distintas modalidades por ejemplo confecciona: alfombras de piso, ruanas de alpaca; además hace decorados y manualidades. Para elaborar sus textiles, cuenta con 6 telares de distintos tamaños. “Este negocio es muy rentable por que para elaborar las ruanas invierto 48 dólares por kilo de lana de alpaca y por kilo obtengo 4 ruanas, las que vendo a 160 soles cada una”, detalla. Además de utilizar lana de alpaca emplea las de ovejas y sintéticas, pero no tienen mucha demanda. Paralelamente a ese oficio, fabrica fuegos artificiales, cohetes, castillones, bombardas, etc., los que vende como precio mínimo a 1000 soles, “gano muy bien, pero tiene sus riesgos, sino se sabe calcular bien la cantidad de químicos puede producirse un incendio y explosiones”, cuenta César. Kenyi su hijo de 13 años siempre va a visitarlo, él es el que el ayuda en sus labores, por esa razón, César anhela tener otro negocio de cerámicas y locerías para brindarles a sus hijos menores una mejor educación. Mediante su ayuda, César podrá adquirir por primera vez un crédito de MFP, por su parte se compromete a ser puntual en el pago de sus cuotas. César agradece de antemano el apoyo. Una de sus metas es abrir una tienda de cerámicas y locería, para ello comprará mercaderías de la ciudad de Huancayo y las venderá a los turistas que visiten su zona. Además invertirá en la compra de lana de alpaca y algunos insumos para elaborar castillones.
texts.en: César is 49 years old and has 7 children, however due to problems with his partner they separated. He now lives alone in his own house in the district of San Pedro de Cajas. Inspite of his family problems, Cesar continues to work as a craftsman, in different mediums. For example he makes: floor mats, alpaca ponchos as well as decorations and handicrafts. To make his textiles he needs 6 different looms of differing sizes. "This business is very profitable because to make the ponchos I invest $48 per kilo of alpaca wool and produce 4 ponchos per kilo. I sell them as 160 soles each," he says. In addition to using alpaca wool he also uses sheep's wool and synthetic wool, but they are not in high demand. Parallel to this work, he makes fireworks: rockets, skyrockets and roman candles, etc., which he sells at a minimum price of 1000 soles, " I earn very well but it has its risks as if you don't know how to calculate precisely the amount of chemicals needed you can cause a fire and explosions," says Cesar. Kenyi, his 13 year old son, always comes to visit him. He is the one that helps him with his work, for this reason, Cesar yearns to have another business selling ceramics and china to give his younger children a better education. With your help, Cesar will be able to get a loan with MFP for the first time. In turn, he agrees to be punctual with his repayments. Cesar is grateful in advance for the support. One of his goals is to open a ceramics and china shop and for it he will buy merchandise from the city of Huancayo and he will sell it to the tourists who visit his area. In addition he will invest in the purchase of alpaca wool and a few consumables with which to make his fireworks.

loans.use: to buy alpaca wool and also handcrafted objects.

loans.name: Twongerumusaruro B Group

texts.fr:
Valentine fait partie du groupe Twongerumusaruro B. Le nom du groupe signifie «augmentons la production». Elle a 28 ans et elle est mariée avec 2 enfants de 3 à 7 ans, dont 1 scolarisés. Son niveau d’éducation est de 7 ans de primaire.

Valentine est cultivatrice de riz. C’est son deuxième  cycle de prêt avec ACB. Elle va utiliser son crédit afin d’acheter des engrais chimiques pour son agriculture de riz. 

Sa stratégie pour la croissance de son business est de faire les semences sélectionnée. Dans les prochaines années, Valentine voudrait être le distributeur dans sa région. Avec les profits, elle prévoit d’éduquer et soigner ses enfants.
texts.en:
Valentine is part of the Twongerumusaruro B. group. The name of the group means “Let’s increase production.” She is 28 years old and married with two children, ages 3 and 7, one of whom attends school. He attended 7 years of elementary school.

Valentine is a rice farmer. This is her second loan with ACB. She is going to use his loan to be able to buy commercial fertilizer for his rice crops.

Her strategy to develop her business is to only use specially selected seeds. In the coming years, Valentine would like to be her region’s distributor. With his profits, she intends to educate and take care of her children.

loans.use: to buy commercial fertilizer for his rice crops

loans.name: Aminata

texts.en:
Meet 46-year-old Aminata from Kissy in eastern area in Freetown, Sierra Leone. She is married with four children between the ages of 10 years and 27 years. In 2006, Aminata established her general merchandise business. She began her business because she wanted to enhance her independence and to assist her husband in covering the household expenses.  She also earns income from hair dressing.  She says that the main challenge to her business is price inflation.

Aminata requires a loan in order to buy more soft drinks and Star beers. She hopes that the extra income from this loan will allow her educate her children. In the future, Aminata plans to own another shop. She thanks you for your support.

loans.use: To purchase more crates of soft drinks and Star beers.

loans.name: Amanda

texts.es: A sus 63 años de edad, esta mujer con gran espíritu de empresaria sostiene su casa y quiere seguir adelante con la compra de más surtido para el negocio por lo que requiere el préstamo para invertirlo en dulces, snak y mercancía general. Su sueño más cercano es poder ampliarse o alquilar un local donde pueda atender mejor a los clientes y que le quede cerca de su casa para seguir con sus labores de abuela y ama de casa.
texts.en: At 63 years of age, this woman, who has a great entrepreneurial spirit, supports her household and would like to move forward in her business by purchasing more stock.  She needs a loan to invest in candies, snacks and general merchandise.  Her short-term dream is to expand her business or rent premises where she can better serve her customers.  She would like her sales premises to be near her home so that she can continue carrying out her duties as a grandmother and housewife.

loans.use: to buy candies, snacks and general merchandise to stock her business

loans.name: Francisco Javier

texts.es: La legumbrería de Francisco Javier es un ejemplo para todos sus colegas por el orden con que la maneja, ya que su experiencia en los negocios lo avala. Su mayor sueño es poder generar empleo a sus familiares y amigos, por eso con el préstamo quiere comprar surtido de dulces y legumbres para ampliar su negocio y darles trabajo a quienes más lo necesita, igualmente su calidad de vida mejorará cuando las ventas y sus ingresos se incrementen.
texts.en: Francisco Javier's vegetable stall is an example to all his colleagues for the order with which he runs it.  This is a result of the business experience that he has.  His biggest dream is to be able to make work for his family members and friends.  He would like to use this loan to buy sweet treats and vegetables to expand his business and provide work to those who need it most.  At the same time, when his sales and income increase, his quality of life will improve too.

loans.use: to buy sweet treats and vegetables to stock his business

loans.name: Bomporo

texts.en:
This is 35-year-old Bomporo from Grassfield in the eastern area in Freetown. She is married with three children between the ages of 13 and 18. Her children are currently attending school.

Bomporo runs a general merchandise store.  At her store, she sells bundled water, crates of soft drinks, batteries and milk. She has been running this business for eight years. She also earns income from renting out a house. She says that the main challenge to her business is dealing with slow sales during the rainy season.

Bomporo has requested a loan in order to buy more food merchandise. The extra income from this loan will allow her to educate her children and maintain good well-being. In the future, she plans to expand her store. She appreciates your support.

loans.use: To purchase more bundles of water, crates of soft drinks, batteries and milk.

loans.name: Alina

texts.es: Alina, tiene la edad de 58 años, es soltera y vive sola, y tiene hijos mayores que viven en Nicaragua. Ella,  hace varios años que Vive en Costa Rica, buscando una mejor calidad de vida y así poder ayudar a sus familiares en lo económico. Tiene varios años que se dedica a vender artículos como , Sandalias, bolsos y otras cosas mas, lo hace visitando casa por casa. Le gusta hacer este trabajo en Costa Rica, porque ya tiene muchas amistades y  puede trabajar tranquila. Es el primer préstamo que ha recibido de FUDECOSUR. También, ella no ha realizado otros préstamos en bancos estatales. FUDECOSUR le brindó el préstamo con mayores facilidades y la tasa de interés es mucho más baja. Alina también tiene el deseo de ayudarle  a sus hijos con dinero para que puedan salir adelante en su país Nicaragua  y puedan enfrentar de manera más fácil la vida.
texts.en: Alina is 58 years old, single and lives alone. She has grown-up children living in Nicaragua. She has been living in Costa Rica for several years, seeking a better quality of life so that she can help her relatives financially. She has been selling sandals, bags and other products door-to-door for several years. She likes doing this work in Costa Rica as she already has a lot of friends and can work in peace. This is the 1st loan that she has received from FUDECOSUR. In addition, she has no other loans with state banks. FUDECOSUR granted her the loan with better conditions and the interest rate is a lot lower. Alina also wants to help her children financially so that they can get ahead in their own country Nicaragua and can more easily cope with life.

loans.use: to buy sandals and bags.

loans.name: Luz Angela

texts.es: Mujeres emprendedoras y luchadoras como Luz Angela, nos demuestran cada día que los sueños si son posibles y se vuelven realidad. Durante más de 10 años esta diseñadora textil lucha junto con su hijo por salir adelante como independiente ya que según ella en las empresas no valoran justamente su trabajo y le pagan muy poco. Con el préstamo quiere comprar implementos para poder seguir con sus creaciones. En un futuro, quiere montar su propio taller pero sabe que todo es paso a paso y que con tesón y organización lo va a lograr.
texts.en: Entrepreneurial and tenacious women such as Luz Angela show us every day that dreams are possible and do come true.  For more than 10 years, this textile designer has been struggling, together with her son, to get ahead as a self-employed person because she is of the opinion that companies don't properly value her work and pay her very little.  She would like to use her loan to buy tools so that she can continue making her creations.  In the future, she would like to set up her own workshop but she knows that everything happens one step at a time and that with determination and organization, she will manage it.

loans.use: to buy paints, paintbrushes and other supplies for making handicrafts

loans.name: Cesar

texts.es: Cesar tiene 25 años, es un joven soltero que vive en una casa alquilada y trabaja para sobresalir en el futuro. Cesar, es un joven trabajador, se dedica a la agricultura, cultivando desde muy temprano café, cacao, asimismo se dedica a sacar la maleza que crece entre sus plantas. Tiene 05 años trabajando como peon y por tanto siempre está en los lugares donde las personas necesitan de su ayuda. Lo que más le gusta es dejar contentos a sus vecinos a quien brinda su apoyo en los cultivos, ya que lo hace muy bien y considera que lo más difícil es tener que trabajar duro para poder solventarse. En lo futuro piensa construir una casa, donde pueda vivir tranquilo y sin tener que pagar el alquiler de donde habita. Este será su crédito numero 03 con MFP y esta muy contento con el apoyo financiero ya que así se siente seguro de cumplir con su objetivo. En su banco comunal se lleva muy bien con todos y es participe en todas las reuniones que se lleva. Con los 3,000 soles, podrá comprar materiales para la construcción de su hogar como: cemento, fierros, ladrillo.
texts.en: Cesar is 25 years old. He is a young single man who lives in a rented house and works to get ahead in the future. Cesar works from early in the day growing coffee, cocoa as well as clearing the weeds growing between the plants. He has been working as a labourer for 5 years and is always to be found where his help is needed. What he likes the most is leaving his neighbours happy after working with their crops, as he works very well and he believes that the hardest thing is to have to work hard to pay his way. In the future, he is thinking of building a house where he can live in peace and without having to pay any rent for where he lives. This will be his 3rd loan with MFP and he is very happy for the financial support as he feels sure that he will reach his goal. He is well-liked by everyone in his communal bank and he is involved in all the meetings that take place. With the 3,000 soles (PEN) he will be able to buy the building materials for his home such as: cement, iron bars, bricks.

loans.use: to buy cement, bricks and iron bars for his house.

loans.name: Abatiganda 9 Zone 2 / Rsz Group

texts.fr:
Elias fait partie du groupe Abatiganda 9 Zone 2. Le nom du groupe signifie «the courageous». Il a 44 ans et il est marié avec 5 enfants de 2 à 21 ans, dont 3 scolarisés, il a 2 personnes en charge autre que ses enfants. Son niveau d’éducation est de 6 ans de primaire.

Elias est cultivateur de riz. C’est son deuxième  cycle de prêt avec ACB. Il va utiliser son crédit afin d’acheter des engrais chimiques pour son agriculture de riz. 

Sa stratégie pour la croissance de son business est de faire les semences sélectionnée. Dans les prochaines années, Elias voudrait être le fournisseur dans sa région. Avec les profits, il prévoit d’éduquer et soigner ses enfants.
texts.en:
Elias is part of the Abatiganda 9 Zone 2 group. The name of the group means “Let’s increase production.” He is 44 years old and married with 5 children between 2 and 21 years of age, of which 3 attend school. He also takes care of 2 others on top of his children. He attended 6 years of elementary school.
Elias is a rice farmer. It’s his second loan with ACB. He is going to use his loan to be able to buy commercial fertilizer for his rice crops.

His strategy to develop his business is to only use specially selected seeds. In the coming years, Elias would like to be his region’s supplier. With his profits, he intends to educate and take care of his children.

loans.use: to buy commercial fertilizer for his rice crops

loans.name: Banco Mujer Nueva Luz Group

texts.es:
Shirley es una de las integrantes de Banco Mujer Nueva Luz, tiene 23 años de edad es casada y madre de un niño de 4 años, su esposo trabaja en una finca Bananera cercana y su salario es muy bajo, por ello Shirley decidió iniciar su pequeño negocio, para colaborar con los gastos familiares y poder pagarse sus estudios, ya que solo pudo ir a la primaria. 
Este es el primer crédito que solicita a Fundación Mujer y se integró al grupo de mujeres ya que su madre que tiene muchos años en el grupo la motivó a integrarse. 
El crédito lo va a invertir en la compra de terneros y alimentos, para el cuido de los animales cuenta con la ayuda y el apoyo de su esposo y su madre.
Este crédito va ser de gran ayuda para Shirley, ya que le permitirá generar ingresos para aportar al hogar y tiene como meta seguir estudiando, al igual que darle estudio a su hijo. 
En esta operación de crédito están junto a Shirley,4 integrantes más todas señoras muy trabajadoras que también va a invertir en la compra de ganado y alimentos para estos animales.
texts.en:
Shirley is one of the members of the Nueva Luz (New Light) Women's Bank.  She is 23 years old, married, and is the mother of a 4-year-old child.  Her husband works on a local banana plantation and his salary is very low.  For this reason, Shirley decided to start her own small business so that she could contribute towards their family expenses and pay for her own studies as she was only able to attend elementary school.

This is the first loan that Shirley has requested from Fundación Mujer and she joined this group of women because her mother, who has been a member of the group for many years, encouraged her to join.

Shirley will invest this loan in buying calves and feed for her animals.  She has the support and help of her husband and her mother.  This loan will be a great help to Shirley as it will allow her to make income for her household and achieve her goals of continuing to study herself and providing an education for her son.

Requesting a loan on this occasion, together with Shirley, are four further members.  They are all very hard-working ladies who will also invest their loans in buying livestock and feed for their animals.

loans.use: to buy calves and feed

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy a firewood truck

loans.name: Fatmata

texts.en:
Fatmata is a 27-year-old single woman living in the western area in Sierra Leone, near the town of Aberdeen. She takes care of one relative at home.

Fatmata has been running her business for five years now and sells biscuits, provisions, bundled water and drinks. Her primary source of income comes from her business of commercial transportation (taxi). She says that the main challenge she faces lately is rapid inflation in the market.

 She requested this loan through BRAC to buy more drinks, bundled water and provisions. She says that the extra income from this loan will help her improve her standard of living. 

Fatmata has plans for expansion in the next 5-10 years, and her main goal is to open other branches in different locations.

loans.use: To buy more drinks, bundled water and other provisions.

loans.name: Jessica

texts.es:
A sus 18 años de edad Jessica es una joven emprendedora que decidió montar su propio negocio a raíz de una capacitación que recibió en creación de empresa, lleva aproximadamente 2 meses en esta labor que desempeña con gran tenacidad para salir adelante, Jessica vende comida rápida a las afueras de su casa, y aunque a veces los horarios son difíciles ve un buen panorama en ventas y posicionamiento.

Actualmente Jessica quiere comprar sillas y mesas para ambientar el espacio de una forma mas cómoda e igualmente comprar insumos para la preparación de la comida, sin embargo no cuenta con el capital necesario para hacer dichas compras, por lo que solicita un crédito que le permita darle mas fuerza a su negocio para que las ventas se incrementen, generando mas ingresos y mejorando su calidad de vida.
texts.en:
At 18 years of age, Jessica is a young entrepreneur who decided to set up her own business as a result of training she received in business creation. She has been working for approximately 2 months at this with great tenacity to get ahead. Jessica sells fast food outside her house and although at times the schedule is difficult she sees a good future ahead for sales and positioning. 

Currently Jessica wants to buy tables and chairs to create a more comfortable ambience in the space as well as buy consumables with which to make the food. However, she does not have the capital necessary to make the purchases which is why she is asking for a loan that will allow her to strengthen her business so that sales increase, generating more income and improving her quality of life.

loans.use: to buy tables, chairs and consumables to improve her business.

loans.name: Fatmata

texts.en:
Fatmata is a 35-year-old married woman living in the western area in Freetown, Sierra Leone, near the town of Aberdeen. She has one child, aged 17 years old. The child is currently attending school.

Fatmata has been running her business for five years now and sells drinks, cream, provisions and bike spare parts. Her primary income source is from the business of commercial bike, while she also sells assorted drinks on occasion. She says that the main challenges to her business are inflation and transportation problems.

 She has now requested this loan to through BRAC in order to buy more assorted drinks, provision and bikes spare parts. She says that the extra income from this loan will help her improve her standard of living.

Fatmata has plans for expansion in the next 5-10 years, and her main goal is to open branches of the same business. She says this will enable her to build a house.

loans.use: To purchase more assorted drinks, provisions, cream and bike spare parts.

loans.name: Hernán De Jesús

texts.es: Tener un carro propio que le permita transportar las frutas es el sueño de Hernán de Jesús del municipio de Santa Barabara al suroeste del departamento de Antioquia en Colombia. Por ahora este emprendedor necesita de un préstamo para comprar mayor cantidad de mangos y así obtener mejores precios para incrementar sus ganancias.
texts.en: Hernán de Jesús' dream is to having his own car which would allow him to transport his fruit. He lives in the municipality of Santa Barabara to the southwest of the department of Antioquia in Colombia. For the moment, this entrepreneur needs a loan to buy a larger amount of mangoes to sell at better prices to increase profits.

loans.use: to buy mangoes.

loans.name: Twisungane N0 22/rsz Group

texts.fr:
Gratien fait partie du groupe Twisungane no 22/Rsz. Le nom du groupe signifie «Mettons nous ensemble». Il a 42 ans et il est marié avec 5 enfants de 1 à 13 ans, dont 4 scolarisés. Son niveau d’éducation est de 6 ans de primaire.

Gratien est cultivateur de riz. C’est son deuxième  cycle de prêt avec ACB. Il va utiliser son crédit afin d’acheter des engrais chimiques pour son agriculture de riz. 

Sa stratégie pour la croissance de son business est de faire les semences sélectionnée. Dans les prochaines années, Gratien voudrait être le fournisseur dans sa région. Avec les profits, il prévoit d’éduquer et soigner ses enfants.
texts.en:
Gratien belongs to the Twisungane no 22/Rsz group.  The name means "let's come together".  He is 42 years old and married, with five children between 1 and 13 years old, four of whom are in school.  His education level is six years of primary school.

Gratien grows rice.  This is his second loan cycle with ACB.  He will use his loan to buy chemical fertilizers for his rice cultivation.

His strategy for the growth of his business is to use selected seeds.  Within the next few years, Gratien would like to be the local supplier.  With his profits, he plans to educate and care for his children.

loans.use: to buy chemical fertilizer for rice farming.

loans.name: Alexander Antonio

texts.es:
A sus 30 años de edad Alexander es un emprendedor incansable, el cual luego de haber trabajado en una microempresa dedicada a la fabricacion de traperos y escobas tomó la decisión de independizarse y crear su propio negocio. Así las cosas, desde hace ya 2 años se dedica a la fabricacion de estos elementos indispensables para el hogar, los cuales vende en el barrio El Bosque y en el corregimiento de El Reposo en Apartadó. De allí el genera ingresos para el sostenimiento de su esposa y sus dos hijos de 6 y 4 años de edad, siendo su mayor sueño poderlos educar, y más adelante ir pagando las cuotas para tener una casa propia.

Alexander solicita este credito para poder ampliar su capacidad productiva y comprar más materia prima, dado que los pedidos que le realizan se han ido incrementando.

El agradece a Dios el haberle permitido encontrar una forma honesta de generar ingresos para su familia, y tambien espera poderle ayudar a muchas otras personas ofreciéndoles empleo desde su microempresa.
texts.en:
The 30 year old Alexander is a tireless entrepreneur who subsequent to working in a small business manfacturing mops and brooms, made the decision to become independent and start his own business. So for the last 2 years he has been manufacturing these indepensable items for the home which he sells in the neighbourhood of El Bosque and the township of El Reposo en Apartadó. From this he generates an income to support his wife and 2 children aged 6 and 4. His biggest dream is to educate them and further in the future pay the installments for a house of his own.

Alexander is asking for a loan to expand his production capacity and buy more raw materials as the orders he is getting have been increasing.

He is grateful to God for allowing him to find an honest way of generating an income for his family and also hopes to be able to help many other people by offering employment in his small business.

loans.use: to buy the raw materials to make brooms and mops.

loans.name: Judith

texts.es: Judith se dedica  a la elaboración de prendas de vestir, ella tiene una macroempresa, porque aprovechó los cursos de modistería, compró su máquina y se arriesgó en su aventura emprendedora,  con la cual genera ingresos y en la que le ha ido muy bien. Sus líneas de trabajo son vestidos informales, prendas interiores y ropa en general para damas juvenil e infantil. La calidad de sus productos es consecuencia de sus estudios técnicos, el perfeccionamiento adquirido a través de su experiencia y su capacidad de riesgo con la que ha logrado bienestar. Su sueño es hacer crecer su negocio y generar empleos que proporciones bienestar a la comunidad. Mientras trabaja esforzadamente maneja una rentabilidad promedia no menor de 39,8% desde la cual proyecta su crecimiento. En la actualidad está aplicando a un credikiva, primer financiamiento que hace a la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, con el cual comprará materias primas, insumos para lograr aumentar su producción y ofrecer nuevos diseños de fin de año, fiestas en las cuales todos quieren estar elegantes.
texts.en: Judith makes clothes. She has a large firm as she took courses in dressmaking, bought a machine and took a chance with an entrepreneurial venture, with which she generates income and is doing very well. Her clothing lines are informal dresses, underwear and clothes in general for young women and infants. The quality of her products is a consequence of her technical studies, improvement gained through experience and her capacity to take risks with which she has achieved well-being. Her dream is to grow her business and generate jobs that will provide the community with a sense of well-being. While working hard, she manages an average return no less than 39.8% from which she projects growth. Currently she is applying for a Kiva loan, her first funding with the Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, with which she will buy raw materials and consumables so as to increase production and offer new designs for the year-end parties at which everyone wants to be stylish.

loans.use: to buy raw materials and consumables.

loans.name: Maxima

texts.es: Máxima, es una mujer trabajadora, tiene 34 años, convive junto a su pareja Filemon. Juntos habitan en una casa alquilada junto a sus 03 hijos, quienes son el motivo de sus esfuerzos. Hace 14 años que se dedica a la agricultura, ella junto a su esposo se levantan muy temprano para poder ir a la chacra donde cultivan hojas de coca; ya que es el único sustento para su familia. Lo que más le gusta de su trabajo es hacerlo con mucha dedicación ya que así produce mejores cultivos y considera que lo más difícil es tener que cargar los sacos llenos de produtos. Este será su crédito número 02 con MFP, por tanto espera de un pequeño préstamo para que pueda cumplir con su objetivo. En su banco comunal se siente muy alegre ya que trabaja con personas que la apoyan y comparten experiencias. El crédito solicitado de 2,000 soles, lo invertirá en la compra de una moto de carga para que pueda trasladar los sacos de hojas de coca hasta su localidad.
texts.en: Máxima is a hardworking woman of 34 years of age. She lives with her partner Filemon. Together they live in a rented house with their 3 children who are the reason for all their efforts. She has been farming for the last 14 years. She and her husband get up very early to go to the farm where they grow coca leaves, as it is the family's sole source of income. What she likes the most about her work is that it is done with so much dedication and in this way produces better crops. She believes that the hardest thing is to have to carry the sacks full of produce. This will be her 2nd loan with MFP and therefore expects a small loan with which to reach her goal. She is very happy with her communal bank as she works with people who support her and share their experiences. She will invest the requested loan of 2,000 soles (PEN) to purchase a motorbike to transport the sacks of coca leaves to her area.

loans.use: to buy a motorbike to transport the crops.

loans.name: Ynes

texts.es: Ynes tiene 46 años, es una mujer muy trabajadora y amable, vive en su casa propia junto a su esposo Hernán de 46 años y sus 05 queridos hijos, quienes son el principal motivo de sus esfuerzos. Ynes se dedica a la venta de combustible, negocio por el que la gente recurre la mayoría de veces. La amabilidad de Ynes hizo que la gente compre combustible sin duda alguna. Tiene 02 años realizando esta actividad y considera que lo más difícil es tener que permanecer durante el día y noche sin descansar. En adelante espera incrementar más productos para su tienda de combustible como: aceites para carros, lubricantes.  Este será su crédito número 06 con MFP y esta dispuesta a seguir pagando sus cuotas a tiempo. En su banco comunal es participe en todas las reuniones que se realiza. Con los 3,000 soles que solicita, podrá comprar productos para su tienda de combustible como: aceites para carros, lubricante, entre otros.
texts.en: Ynes is 46 years old and is a hardworking and friendly woman who lives in her own house with her husband Hernan of 46 years of age and her 5 dear children, who are the main reason for her efforts. Ynes sells fuel, a business which is most used by people. Ynes' friendliness convinces people to buy fuel without a doubt. She has been doing this work for 2 years and believes that the hardest part of the job is having to be permanently available, day and night, without being able to rest. In the future she hopes to increase the number of products for her fuel store such as: car oil, lubricants. This will be her 6th loan with MFP and she is willing to continue paying her repayments on time. She takes part in all the meetings her communal bank holds. With the 3,000 soles (PEN) she will be able to buy products for her store such as: car oil, lubricants among others.

loans.use: to buy fuel, oil and lubricants for cars.

loans.name: Abadahemuka/shr Group

texts.fr:
Philippe fait partie du groupe Abadahemuka/Shr. Le nom du groupe signifie «les fideles». Il a 34 ans et il est marié avec 6 enfants de 2 à 10 ans, dont 4 scolarisés. Son niveau d’éducation est de 5 ans de primaire.

Philippe est cultivateur de riz. C’est son premier  cycle de prêt avec ACB. Il va utiliser son crédit afin d’acheter des engrais chimiques pour son agriculture de riz. 

Sa stratégie pour la croissance de son business est de faire les semences sélectionnée. Dans les prochaines années, Philippe voudrait être le distributeur du riz dans sa région. Avec les profits, il prévoit d’éduquer et soigner ses enfants.
texts.en:
Philip is part of the Abadahemuka/Shr group. The group's name means "the faithful".

He is 34 years old and is married with six children aged two to ten years, including four who attend school. His own schooling has been five years of primary school.

Philippe is a rice farmer. It is his first loan cycle with ACB. He will use his credit to buy fertilizer for his rice farming activity.

His strategy for growing his business is to use selected seeds. In coming years, Philippe would like to become the rice distributor for the region. With his profits, he plans to look after his children's care and education needs.

loans.use: buy fertilizer for his rice farming activity.

loans.name: Anny

texts.es: A sus 21 años, Anny promete como empresaria emprendedora que quiere generar muchos empleos en su café Internet y poder darle a su familia una mejor calidad de vida. Su negocio requiere, para prestar un mejor servicio, de la compra de insumos y monitores para los computadores, por lo cual utilizará el préstamo de una forma responsable y efectiva. Su sueño más inmediato es cumplirle a su padre la misión que le dejó en cuidar muy bien el negocio para que tengan de qué subsistir en un futuro.
texts.en: Twenty-one year old Anny is making a commitment as an entrepreneur to create many jobs in her Internet café and to give her family a better quality of life. Her business needs are, in order to provide better service, the purchase of supplies and computer monitors, which will put to use the money from the loan responsibly and effectively. Her main goal is to fulfill her fathers’ mission when he left her the business of taking very good care of it in order that she could make ends meet in the future.

loans.use: to buy supplies including computer monitors for her business

loans.name: Claudia Elena

texts.es:
A sus 36 años de edad, Claudia es una mujer luchadora que busca sacar sus dos hijos de 15 y 6 años adelante, brindándoles estudio, por medio de la venta ambulante de comidas rápidas como salchipapas, arepas de queso y butifarra entre otros. Ella en su esfuerzo por darles todo lo que necesitan, alterna esta actividad brindando servicios de peluquería a domicilio.

Con el crédito Claudia invertirá en la compra de insumos para la venta de comidas rápidas, como desechables y carnes frías, porque se ha dado cuenta de que así puede abrir más temprano y generar mayores ingresos, ya que su familia los necesita.
texts.en:
At her 36 years of age, Claudia is a determined woman who tries to find ways of taking care of her 2 children, aged 15 and 6, providing them with an education. She does this as a street vendor selling food such salchipapas (sausage and chips), cheese arepas (tortillas stuffed with cheese) and sausage among others. In her effort to give her children all they need, she alternates this work with providing hairdressing services at home. 

With the loan, Claudia will invest in the purchase of consumables for her fast food service, such as disposable plates and spoons as well as processed meat, because she has realized that in this way she can open earlier and generate more revenue which her family needs.

loans.use: to buy consumables such as disposable plates and spoons as well as processed meat.

loans.name: Cirila

texts.es: Cirila tiene 38 años, es una mujer trabajadora y soltera, vive en su casa propia junto a sus 04 hijos a quienes desea brindar una mejor calidad de vida.  Desde muy pequeña a Cirila, le enseñaron sobre el cultivo de plantas en la chacra. Ahora trabaja en sus propios cultivos para salir adelante, lleva 30 años cultivando cacao y es uno de los mejores granos que se puede ofrecer. A pesar de ser una mujer, sabe que tiene que esforzarse y dedicarle tiempo a sus cultivos, no hay nada difícil, su único es fin es solventar los gastos económicos de su hogar. Con el tiempo desea mejorar su chacra comprando materiales como: fertilizantes, abono. Este será su crédito número 04 con MFP y agradece el apoyo financiero, ya que puede seguir cumpliendo con su trabajo. En su banco comunal se lleva bien con todos y comparten experiencias del trabajo. Con el crédito solicitado, podrá comprar sacos de fertilizantes, y abono.
texts.en:
Cirila is a 38-year-old single workingwoman who lives in her own house together with her 4 children and she wants to give them a better quality of life. From a very early age they taught Cirila about the cultivation of plants on the farm. Now she works with her own crops in order to get ahead and she’s been growing cacao for 30 years and it is one of the best beans you can offer. Despite being a woman, she knows she has to work hard and spend time with her crops, it’s not difficult, and her only purpose is to be able to meet the household expenses. 

In the future she hopes to improve her farm buying supplies such as fertilizer and compost. This will be her 4th loan with MFP and she is grateful for the financial help, so she can continue her work. She gets along well with everyone in her communal bank and they share work experiences. With this loan she will buy bags of fertilizer and compost.

loans.use: to buy bags of fertilizer and compost

loans.name: Daysi Lizzeth

texts.es:
Deysi  Lizzeth, es una señora de 51 años de edad, madre soltera quien vive en una aldea  de Esparta Atlántida, tiene una  hija de 24 años de edad y esta estudiando en la Universidad.

Desde hace 3 años se dedica al  negocio de venta de productos HERBALIFE (productos medicinales) y como diversificación del negocio vende ropa de vestir. 
Ella comenzó consumiendo este producto HERBALIFE y ahora los distribuye con el objetivo también de compartir una mejor salud con demás personas.

Sus ingresos son complementados por la ayuda de su ex esposo.
El financiamiento que ODEF le ha dado es para comprar y surtir de productos HERBALIFE para cumplir con los pedidos. Con  las ganancias ella mejorará su calidad de vida y ayudar a la educación de su hija.
texts.en:
Deysi Lizzeth is a 55 year old woman.  She is a single mother who lives in the Esparta Atlántida village.  She has a 24 year old daughter who attends the university.

She has had her business of selling Herbalife products (medicinal products) for three years.  As a diversification of her business she sells clothes.  She started taking this Herbalife product, and now she distributes it with the objective of sharing better health with other people.

Her income is supplemented with the help of her ex husband.

The loan that ODEF has given her is to buy and stock Herbalife products in order to complete her orders.  She will use the income to improve her quality of life and to help with her daughter’s education.

loans.use: to stock her business with Herbalife products (medicinal products).

loans.name: Gonzalo

texts.es:
Gonzalo de 42 años vive en la ciudad de Barranquilla, tiene un hijo de 8 años de edad y se dedica a  vender accesorios para motocicletas. Su negocio inicó hace 13 años, cuando procedente de la ciudad de Bucaramanga, en el departamento de Santander, llegó a Barranquilla en busca de oportunidades de trabajo; fue así como decidió emprender un negocio con el fin de generar sus propios ingresos. Sus principales clientes, lo constituyen personas que trabaja transportando a través de  motocicletas, mercado  que cada día   aumenta especialmente en los municipios alrededor de la ciudad y al sur de la misma, así mismo propietarios de motocicletas que la usan para su uso personal.
Su meta es lograr un crecimiento empresarial, que le permita un mayor bienestar familiar. Esta es la razón por la cual acude a su primer financiamiento con la Fundación Mario Santo Domingo, con el cual comprará cascos, chalecos y otros accesorios. Su gran sueño es tener un local bien posicionado donde sea reconocido en toda la ciudad.
texts.en:
Gonzalo, 42, lives in the city of Barranquilla.  He has an 8-year-old son and works selling motorcycle accessories.  

He started his business 13 years ago, when he arrived looking for work from the city of Bucaramanga, in the department of Santander.  This was how he decided to undertake a business with the goal of generating his own income.  

His main customers are people who work transporting by motorcycle, a market that grows every day, especially in the towns around the city and to the south.  Motorcycle owners also buy for their personal use.

Gonzalo's goal is to achieve business growth, which would allow greater well-being for his family.  This is why he is requesting his first loan with Fundación Mario Santo Domingo.

He will buy helmets, jackets, and other accessories.

His big dream is to have a well-positioned place in which he will be recognized throughout the city.

loans.use: to buy helmets, vests, and other accessories

loans.name: Hector Leon

texts.es:
A sus 25 años de edad Hector ha encontrado una actividad que le permite generar ingresos de manera honesta y a su ves ayudar a su novia, la cual es también un persona de escasos recursos.

Ambos luchan por salir adelante por medio de la venta de ropa desde su negocio Fashion Star Antioquia, el cual han visto que puede crecer, y a su ves generarles mayores ingresos con los cuales pueden ir mejorando sus condiciones de vida y las de sus familias. Así las cosas, se encuentran solicitando un crédito que les permita adquirir un mayor inventario para poder ofrecer un mayor surtido a sus clientes, y así llevarlos a que compren todos aquellos estilos que les permitirán estar siempre a la moda.

Su mayor sueño es ir creciendo, y consolidarse como una empresa que tenga por lo menos 10 almacenes más en Colombia y 2 en Brazil.
texts.en:
At his 25 years of age, Hector has found an activity that allows him to generate income in an honest way and, in turn, help his girlfriend who is also a person of scarce resources.

Both fight to get ahead by selling clothing from their business, Fashion Star Antioquia, which they have seen grow and generate for them greater income which they can use to improve their quality of life and that of their families. So, they are requesting a loan that will permit them to acquire greater inventory in order to be able to offer more stock to their customers and get them to buy all of those styles that will allow them to always be in fashion.

His greatest dream is to continue growing and consolidate as a company that has at least 10  more stores in Colombia and two in Brazil.

loans.use: to purchase merchandise since until now he's had little inventory.

loans.name: Luis

texts.es: Luís es un joven padre de 22 años, convive junto a Narcisa de 20 años. Juntos habitan en su casa propia junto a su pequeño hijo de 01 año a quien desea un futuro mejor. Luís, se dedica a la agricultura, él tiene su chacra en la que produce café,  por lo que tiene 01 año realizando esta actividad, pues su único fin es brindar un mejor provenir a su hijo. Cada mañana se levanta muy temprano y se despide de su hijo para poder ir a su chacra a estar permanente con sus cultivos. Lo que más le gusta de trabajo, es poder hacerlo en compañía de sus amigos quienes lo apoyan; sin embargo lo más difícil es no darle un hogar en buen estado a su pequeño hijo, ya que por ahora esta viviendo en una casa de madera. Con el tiempo desea construir su casa a base de material noble  y que su familia se sienta segura. Este será su crédito número 02 con MFP, por tanto espera el apoyo de cada uno de ustedes para continuar trabajando. Además le agrada ser parte de banco comunal ya que todos son responsables y solidarios. Con los 2,000 soles, podrá comprar materiales de construcción como: cemento, ladrillos, fierros, alambres, entre otros; para construir su casa.
texts.en:
Luís, a young father, is 22 years old and lives together with Narcisa who is 20 years old. Together they live in their own house together with his 1 year old infant and he hopes for a better future for his child. Luís works in agriculture. He has a farm and grows coffee, and has been doing this for one year in order to provide better for his child. Each morning he gets up very early and says goodbye to his child and goes to his ever-waiting crops.

What he likes most about his work is being able to work with his friends who help him, and the hardest is not to be able to provide a home in good shape for his little child, as right now he is living in a wooden house. Over time he wants to construct a home built with better materials so that his family will feel safe.

This will be his 2nd loan with MFP, and he is hoping for help from each of you so he can continue working. He also likes being a part of the communal bank because they are all responsible and caring. With the 2,000 soles from the loan he will buy construction materials such as cement, bricks, iron bars, and wire among other items in order to build his house.

loans.use: to buy cement, bricks, iron bars, and wire in order to build his house.

loans.name: Jairo Antonio

texts.es: En una de las comunidades cercanas a la ciudad de Estelí llamada el Dorado, es una zona conocida por su alta productividad de hortalizas, este sector de la agricultura es una de la actividades mas comunes y productiva de la zona, es ahí donde vive el Joven  Jairo de 24 años de edad, el se dedica a sembrar hortalizas, siendo la cebolla uno de los principales productos que cosecha. Inicio sembrando ½ manzana de tomate, el entusiasmado dice que cuando   logro sembrar por primera vez  pues le fue muy bien  logro vender a un buen precio su primera cosecha tenia quince años, su padre le ayudo ya que fue en terrenos de su padre donde sembró por primera vez, con su primera ganancia ahorro para poder darle un techo donde vivir a su compañera de vida. Hoy en día se dedica a cultivar cebolla y tomates junto con sus hermanos quienes lo ayudan a sembrar. El solicito el crédito para compra semilla de cebolla y compra de insumos. El crédito le ayudara a comprar la semilla que es material vegetativo que necesita para cultivar. Su siguiente paso después de sembrar cebolla el quiere sembrar tomates. En sus planes futuros quiere comprar su propio terreno, comprar equipos de riego .
texts.en: In one of the communities close to the city of Estelí llamada el Dorado is an area known for its high productivity of vegetables. This agricultural sector is one of the most common and productive activities of the area. It is there where young Jairo, 24, lives. He is dedicated to growing vegetables, onion being one of the main products that he harvests. He began planting half tomatoes.The enthusiasm dictated that when he planted for the first time, it went well and he sold his first crop at a good price when he was 15 years old. His father helped him since he was in his father's land where he farmed for the first time. With his first earnings, he saved so he could put a roof where his girlfriend lived. Today he is dedicated to farming onion and tomatoes along with his brothers who help him to plant. He is requesting a loan to buy onion seed and to purchase inputs. The loan will help him to buy the seed which is vegetative material that he needs to farm. His next task, after planting onion, is to plant tomatoes. In the future, he wishes to buy his own land and to buy irrigation equipment.

loans.use: to purchase onion seed and inputs.

loans.name: Tubumwe Mubikorwa/rsz Group

texts.fr:
Jean fait partie du groupe Tubumwe mu Bikorwa. Le nom du groupe signifie «Let us acting as one Person». Il a 54 ans et il est marié avec 6 enfants de 2 à 10 ans, dont 4 scolarisés, il a 3 personnes en charge autre que ses enfants. Son niveau d’éducation est de 5 ans de primaire.

Jean est cultivateur de riz. C’est son deuxième  cycle de prêt avec ACB. Il va utiliser son crédit afin d’acheter des engrais chimiques pour son agriculture de riz. 

Sa stratégie pour la croissance de son business est de faire les semences sélectionnée. Dans les prochaines années, Jean voudrait être le fournisseur du riz dans sa région. Avec les profits, il prévoit d’éduquer et soigner ses enfants.
texts.en:
Jean is part of the Tubumwe mu Bikorwa group. The group's name means "Let us act as one person".

He is 54 years old and is married with six children aged two to ten years, including four who attend school. Other than his children he has three people under his care. His own level of education has been five years of primary school.

John is a rice farmer. This is his second loan cycle with ACB. He will use his credit to buy fertilizer for his rice farming activity.

His strategy for growing his business is to used selected seedlings. In coming years, John would like to become the supplier of rice in the region. With his profits, he plans to take care of his children's educational and other needs.

loans.use: buy fertilizer for his rice farming activity.

loans.name: Angela Rosa

texts.es: Palacaguina municipio de Estelí, en donde proviene doña Ángela una amable y calidad señora de 41 años, quien se dedica a elaborar unos sabrosos frescos, es madre de dos hijos, casada. Ella desde temprana edad trabaja antes vendía guineos vendía y compraba plátanos también los vendía en toda su comunidad, pero un decidió que rea tiempo de hacer algo nuevo fue entonces que comenzó a vender frescos sus primeros clientes fueron sus propia familia quienes la motivaron aun mas para poner su negocio. Actualmente se dedica a vender a los trabajadores de las fábricas cercanas a su comunidad. Ella requiere el préstamo para arreglar las puertas de  su hogar , algunas partes de su casa esta algo deteriorada pero la preocupa las puertas de su casa que necesitan mayor seguridad, es por ello que quiere ir componiendo su casa poco a poco , seguir con su negocio, luchas por mejorar su calidad de vida.
texts.en:
Angela, a kind woman with good qualities, comes from the small town of Palacaguina in the municipality of Estelí. She is 41 years old and works making delicious drinks. She is married and has two children. 

From an early age she worked selling bananas, buying and selling plantains throughout her community. But then she decided to do something new and it was then that she began to sell beverages. Her first customers were her own family who motivated her even more to have her own business. Now she sells to factory workers in the community. 

She is asking for a loan in order to fix the doors of her house. Some areas of her house are a bit deteriorated but her biggest worry is the doors of the house that need be better secured, and this is why she wants to go on repairing her house little by little, and to continue in her business, struggling to improve her quality of life.

loans.use: to fix the doors of her house

loans.name: Domingo Antonio

texts.es: Don Domingo, tiene 60 años de edad, casado, padre de dos hijos independientes, originario de la ciudad de Estelí. El es panadero, antes de dedicarse a elaborar pan el era sastre pero un día vio que el negocio de panadería generaba mejores ingresos, pues un día se puso a probar el mismo hacer pan, con la esperanza de lograr tener su panadería, y poder cambiarles el nivel de vida a su familia y lo logro han pasado 5 años. Hoy en día su panadería es un negocio que es rentable, su esposa lo ayuda en el negocio. Es por ello que solicita el préstamo para comprar harina, aceite, levadura, manteca, azúcar , compra de sartenes y parrillas para colocar el pan, la inversión le será de mucha ayuda pues podrá tener material suficiente para los pedidos de Diciembre y aumentar su producción. Su próxima meta es comprar maquinas revolvedoras de pan , hacerles reparaciones a su panadería y lograr contratar a personas para ayudarlo en su negocio ya que en lo futuro desea ampliarlo.
texts.en: Domingo is 60 years old, married, father of two adult children, and a native of Estelí.  He is a baker.  Before he began baking bread, he was a tailor but one day he realized that the bakery business generated higher income.  So one day, with the hope of having his own bakery and being able to improve the standard of living for his family, he began trying to make bread. He achieved his goal five years ago.  Today, his bakery is a profitable and his wife helps him with the business.  He is requesting the loan to buy flour, oil, yeast, butter, and sugar as well as pans and bread racks on which to place the bread.  The investment will be a great help as he will have enough ingredients to fill December orders and increase his production.  His next goals are to purchase a dough mixer, make repairs to his bakery, and hire people to help him in his business as he wishes to expand in the future.

loans.use: to purchase flour, oil, yeast, butter, and sugar as well as pans and bread racks on which to place the bread.

loans.name: Jorge Orlando

texts.es: El señor Jorge es un cliente emprendedor que tiene su consultora constructora en la  zona casco viejo, solicito un crédito en nuestra agencia para la compra de motocicleta. El cliente demostró un trato amable y Cortez en la evaluación que se lo hizo, el señor Jorge es muy trabajador y además dedicado a su trabajo, padre de familia y junto a su esposa tienen la voluntad y la idea de que con trabajo, un día tendrá otra consultora en otro lugar también comercial y con mayores servicios y rentabilidad.
texts.en: Jorge is an enterprising client who has a construction consulting business in the old city center.  He asked our agency for a loan to buy a motorcycle.  He treated us kindly and courteously during the evaluation he underwent.  Jorge is a very hard worker and is dedicated to his job.  He’s a father and with his wife shares the willingness and the idea that through hard work one day he’ll have another consulting firm in another commercial zone with more services and profitability.

loans.use: to buy a motorcycle.

loans.name: Nelly

texts.en:
Nelly is married and has adult children and two others who still attend school.  She lives in Malindi, a coastal town in Kenya, popular with italian tourists.  She joined Milango eight months ago after being invited by a friend. 

Nelly is requesting a loan for 60,000 KES, which she will use to purchase more foodstuffs for her hotel. With this loan, Nelly will be able to pay her children's school fees.  With the rising need for transport in most upcoming centers in her area, Nelly would like to purchase motorcycles to serve her neighbors in the future.

loans.use: to purchase flour, sugar, and milk.

loans.name: Diego

texts.es: El Joven Diego se dedica a la confección de chalecos, chamarras y otras prendas de vestir que le soliciten, el negocio se encuentra ubicado el la ciudad del Alto de la Paz Bolivia, por la populosa zona de la 16 de julio, esta zona es conocida por ser comercial ya que los habitantes se dedican en su mayoría a la compra y venta de artículos de primera necesidad y otros que satisface la demanda de esta ciudad. El Joven Diego es soltero, por las noches estudia en la universidad publica, su mayor sueño es de concluir sus estudios profesionales y así servir a su país contribuyendo al progreso, para brindar un futuro mejor a su futura familia, el dinero del crédito lo utilizara en la compra de un equipo de sonido para su uso personal.
texts.en:
Young Diego sews vests, jackets and any other articles of clothing he’s requested.  The business is located in the city of El Alto in La Paz, Bolivia, in the crowded 16 de Julio neighborhood.  This zone is noted for being commercial and its residents are for the most part merchants of staple items and other merchandise that meets the city’s demand.

Diego is single and is attending public university in the evening.  His greatest dream is to complete his professional studies to serve the nation contributing to its progress and to provide a better future for his future family.  

He will use the money he’s requesting to buy a sound system for his personal use.

loans.use: to buy sound equipment.

loans.name: Fabiola

texts.es: La Señora Fabiola nacida en la ciudad de Beni,  vive en la ciudad de Santa Cruz hace 15 años, tiene un hijo de 4 años,  trabaja con EMPRENDER desde el 2010 es su segundo ciclo, se dedica a la venta de comida desde hace dos años, vende comida por su zona donde tiene muchos clientes ya que la Sra. Fabiola cocina riquísimos platillos, además que atiende con amabilidad a sus clientes, el crédito tiene como destino Compra de Frízer para poder mantener sus verduras para realizar sus platillos y los refrescos fríos, este frízer seria de buena utilidad para el negocio de la  Sra. Fabiola, por lo cual Kiva la esta ayudando para que siga adelante.
texts.en:
Fabiola was born in the city of Beni and has lived in the city of Santa Cruz for the last 15 years; she has a four-year-old son.  She’s been working with EMPRENDER since 2010 and this is her second cycle.  She has been selling food for the last two years in her neighborhood where she has many customers.  Fabiola cooks delicious dishes and also treats her customers kindly.

The loan will be used to buy a freezer so that she can store vegetables to make her dishes and to keep her beverages cold.  This freezer will be very useful for Fabiola’s business that Kiva is helping her to make progress in.

loans.use: to buy a freezer.

loans.name: Amos

texts.en: Amos lives in the Changamwe area of Coastal Province, Kenya. He is married and has a one-month-old baby. For the last year, he has operated a business selling utensils which is located at the industrial center of town, where a high number of casual laborers who need what he sells come to work every day. Amos joined Milango a few months ago and is applying for a loan for Ksh 40,000 to buy more utensils to sell. In the future, he hopes to own a shop where he can sell larger amounts of goods.

loans.use: to buy more utensils to sell to his customers.

loans.name: Caroline

texts.en:
Caroline lives in Changamwe, Kenya and sells clothes, a business she has done for the last two years. She is single and has one child who is four years old and has begun schooling. The area has a high number of both middle and low-income people who form the bulk of her clients.

She has applied for a loan of KSHS 40,000 to help her restock her business with additional clothes in preparation for the December high season. Caroline’s main aim is to grow the business to a boutique shop dealing with new clothes. From this business, her child can obtain better education and good nutrition.

loans.use: To buy additional stock of clothes

loans.name: Iracema

texts.es: La Señora Iracema tiene 36 años de edad nacida en la ciudad de Beni, ella vive en su domicilio propio en la zona de Bibosi, trabaja con EMPRENDER desde el 2009, se dedica a la venta de comida desde hace dos años, vende comida por su zona donde tiene muchos clientes ya que la Sra. Iracema cocina riquísimos platillos, además que atiende con amabilidad a sus clientes, el crédito tiene como destino compra de una lavadora para su uso personal, la Sra. Iracema es una persona trabajadora su deseo es poder tener un restaurante y así poder brindar un mejor servicio a sus clientes, se siente agradecida por la oportunidad que le brindan.
texts.en:
Señora Iracema, age 36, was born in the city of Beni. She lives in her own home in the Bibosi neighborhood. She has worked with EMPRENDER since 2009. For two years, she has sold food in her neighborhood. Sra. Iracema has a lot of customers because she cooks very tasty dishes and gives friendly service to her customers.

The purpose of the loan is for the purchase of a washing machine for her personal use. Sra. Iracema is a hardworking person who wants to be able to have a restaurant and, thus, offer better service to her customers. She is thankful for the opportunity she has been provided.

loans.use: to buy a washing machine.

loans.name: Josiah

texts.en:
Josiah lives in the coastal town of Changamwe. He runs a battery charging and repair business, which has been in operation for four years. Besides this, he runs a salon business. He is married and has one child who has not joined school.  

He joined Milango in May of this year and repaid his first loan well. Since he also repairs batteries, he has decided to apply for a loan of KSH 40,000 in order to purchase battery repair raw materials.

The income from this loan will help Josiah provide for his family's needs and start saving for his child’s future education. He looks forward to be a new battery dealer in the coming years.

loans.use: To purchase battery repair equipment

loans.name: Benard

texts.en:
Benard lives in the Changamwe area of Coast Province, Kenya and operates a motorcycle transport business. He has done this for two years and it has enabled him to start an outside catering business too. He is married and has four children. The two youngest children still depend on him and are in school.

Owing to the increase in the cost of fuel, Benard has applied for a loan of KSH 20,000 to revamp his outside catering business. He believes from this, he can continue to educate his children and improve his living standard.

Benard has set a target of opening up an electronics shop and a wholesale business in the near future. He is happy to be associated with Milango and its partners.

loans.use: To purchase catering items/utensils

loans.name: Jose Jorge

texts.es:
José Jorge tiene 31 años de edad es soltero no tiene hijos vive con la madre en el cantón Chillanes provincia de Bolívar.
LA VRC MONTE DE LOS OLIVOS, se encuentra ubicada en la parroquia San José del Tambo a 60 minutos de la oficina conformada por 14 socios y socias. Esta Ventanilla se dedica a Labores Agrícolas de ciclo corto Siembra de maíz, naranja y cacao.
José se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maíz, naranja y cacao las compras y las ventas las realiza en el Cantón Chillanes. Solicita el Crédito para comprar semillas, insumos agrícolas como urea, mata monte, fertilizantes, veneno para la maleza para mantener en buenas condiciones los cultivos.
El Crédito será de mucha ayuda porque se podrá mejorar la calidad del producto comprar los insumos y semillas sin ningún probL..
Los desafíos que se le presenta  muy frecuentes son: la competencia y las plagas. El sueño es seguir trabajando para poder adquirir otro préstamo pero ya el monto más alto para comprar más terreno.
En los tiempos libres le gusta practicar el deporte en especial el futbol.
texts.en:
Jose Jorge is 31 years old, single, with no children, and lives with his mother in Chillanes canton, Bolivar province.

The “Monte de los Olivos” (Mount of Olives) communal bank is located in San Jose del Tambo parish, some 60 minutes from our office, and is composed of 14 members, male and female. Its members are dedicated to agricultural work on the short cycle. They sow corn, oranges and cacao.

Jose too is dedicated to agriculture. He plants corn, oranges, and cacao, and does his buying and selling in Chillanes canton. He is requesting a loan to buy seeds and agricultural inputs such as urea, herbicides, fertilizers, and weed killer to maintain his plantings in good condition. The loan will be a great help because buying these inputs and seeds without problems will improve the quality of the harvest.

Challenges very frequently occur, including competition and crop plagues. Jose's dream is to continue working to be able to acquire another loan for a larger sum to obtain more land.

In his free time, Jose likes to practice sports, especially soccer.

loans.use: to buy seeds and agricultural inputs such as urea, herbicides fertilizers, and weed killer.

loans.name: Edison Alcibar

texts.es:
Edison Acíbar tiene 33 años de edad  vive en unión libre  tiene un hijo, vive con la esposa y con el hijo de doce años de edad en Chillanes Provincia Bolívar.

LA VRC MONTE DE LOS OLIVOS, se encuentra ubicada en la parroquia San José del Tambo a 60 minutos de la oficina conformada por 14 socios y socias. Esta Ventanilla se dedica a Labores Agrícolas de ciclo corto Siembra de maíz, naranja y cacao.

Edison se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maíz, naranja y cacao las compras y las ventas las realiza en el Cantón Chillanes. Solicita el Crédito para comprar semillas, insumos agrícolas como urea, mata monte, fertilizantes, veneno para la maleza para mantener en buenas condiciones los cultivos.

El Crédito será de mucha ayuda porque podrá mejorar la calidad de vida. Los desafíos que se le presenta  muy frecuentes son: la competencia y las plagas. El sueño es seguir trabajando para algún día comprarse una casa.
En los tiempos libres le gusta pasar con la familia.
texts.en:
Edison Acíbar is 33. He is in a common-law marriage and has one 12-year-old child; they live together in Chillanes, Bolivar province.

The Monte de los Olivos Communal Bank is located in the San Jose del Tambo parish, 60 minutes away from the office. It is made up of 14 members, male and female. The members of this group work in short-cycle agriculture, sowing corn, oranges, and cocoa.

Edison also works in agriculture, sowing corn, oranges, and cocoa. He buys and sells his products in the Chillanes Canton. He is requesting this loan for the purchase of seeds and agricultural supplies such as urea, herbicides, fertilizers, and weed-killer in order to keep his crops in good condition.

This loan will be very useful for him because it will allow him to improve his quality of life. Competition is a frequent challenge for him, as are pests. His dream is to continue working in order to be able to buy himself a house one day.
He likes to spend his free time with his family.

loans.use: to buy seeds and agricultural supplies such as urea, herbicides, fertilizers, and weed-killer.

loans.name: Dimas Wilfrido

texts.es:
Dimas Wilfrido tiene 20 años de edad es soltero no tiene hijos, vive con los padres en el Cantón Chillanes provincia de Bolívar.
LA VRC MONTE DE LOS OLIVOS, se encuentra ubicada en la parroquia San José del Tambo a 60 minutos de la oficina conformada por 14 socios y socias. Esta Ventanilla se dedica a Labores Agrícolas de ciclo corto Siembra de maíz, naranja y cacao.
Dimas se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maíz, naranja y cacao las compras y las ventas las realiza en el Cantón Chillanes. Solicita el Crédito para comprar semillas, insumos agrícolas como urea, mata monte, fertilizantes, veneno para la maleza para mantener en buenas condiciones los cultivos.
El Crédito será de mucha ayuda porque podrá mejorar la calidad de vida. Los desafíos que se le presenta  muy frecuentes son: la competencia y las plagas. El sueño es tener comprar más tierra y sembrar más.
En los tiempos libres le gusta  jugar el indor.
texts.en:
Dimas Wilfrido is 20. He is single, has no children, and lives with his parents in the Chillanes Canton, Bolivar province.
The Monte de Los Olivos Communal Bank is located in the San Jose del Tambo parish, 60 minutes from the office. The group has 14 members, male and female, who work in short-cycle agriculture, sowing corn, oranges and cocoa.
Dimas works in agriculture, sowing corn, oranges and cocoa. He buys and sells his products in the Chillanes Canton. He is requesting this loan for the purchase of seeds and agricultural supplies such as urea, herbicides, fertilizers, and weed killer in order to keep his crops in good condition.
This loan will be very helpful for him, because it will allow him to have a better quality of life. The most frequent challenges that he encounters are: competition and pests. His dream is to buy more land and plant more crops.
In his free time he enjoys playing indoor soccer.

loans.use: to buy seeds and agricultural supplies such as urea, herbicides, fertilizers, and weed killer.

loans.name: Dominga Victoria

texts.es: La Sra. Dominga, es clienta antigua, que se encuentra en la cuarta secuencia en nuestra institución, en el momento de la evaluación del crédito la Sra. Dominga demostró una actitud buena, Cortez y amable, razón por la cual se le otorgo el crédito,   La Sra. Dominga vive en la zona Sopocachi, de la ciudad de La Paz Bolivia, ella en la actualidad vive con su hija, la Sra. se dedica a la venta de diversos productos, ella tiene su puesto de venta en zona de Sopocachi cerca de una universidad,  ya hace unos 14 años que tiene su kiosco donde ya es muy conocida por la zona, el crédito va invertir en la compra de mercadería como cigarros y tarjetas telefónicas y otra mercadería para surtir el negocio de su kiosco.
texts.en: Dominga is an old client, and has had four loans with the communal bank. When the bank evaluated her loan Dominga was found to have a good attitude, polite and friendly, and this is why she was approved for a loan. Dominga lives with her daughter in the Sopocachi area of the city of La Paz, Bolivia. She works selling various products. Her business is located in the Sopocachi area near a university, and she has had her kiosk there for about 14 years so it already well known in the area. She will use the loan to buy merchandise such as cigarettes and phone cards and other merchandise in order to supply her kiosk.

loans.use: to buy cigarettes and phone cards and other merchandise in order to supply her kiosk

loans.name: Jesus Alberto

texts.es:
Jesus Alberto tiene 47 años de edad vive en unión libre tiene un hijo, vive con la esposa y con el hijo de 17 años de edad en el Cantón Chillanes provincia de Bolívar.
LA VRC MONTE DE LOS OLIVOS, se encuentra ubicada en la parroquia San José del Tambo a 60 minutos de la oficina conformada por 14 socios y socias. Esta Ventanilla se dedica a Labores Agrícolas de ciclo corto Siembra de maíz, naranja y cacao.
Jesus se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maíz, naranja y cacao las compras y las ventas las realiza en el Cantón Chillanes. Solicita el Crédito para comprar semillas, insumos agrícolas como urea, mata monte, fertilizantes, veneno para la maleza para mantener en buenas condiciones los cultivos.
El Crédito será de mucha ayuda porque podrá mejorar el negocio y la calidad de vida. Los desafíos que se le presenta  muy frecuentes son: la competencia y las plagas. El sueño es tener comprar más tierra y sembrar más.
En los tiempos libres le gusta  practicar el deporte en especial el boley.
texts.en:
Jesús Alberto is 47 years old and living in a common law relationship.  He has a son.  He lives with his wife and 17-year-old son in Chillanes Canton, Bolívar Province.

The “Monte de los Olivos” communal bank is located in San José del Tambo Parish sixty minutes from this office.  It has 14 members, men and women.  This communal bank is dedicated to short cycle corn, orange and cocoa bean farming.

Jesús is a corn, orange and cocoa bean farmer.  His purchases and his sales take place in Chillanes Canton.  He’s asking for the loan to buy seeds and farming supplies like urea, Matamonte [herbicide], fertilizer and weed killer to maintain his crops in good condition.

The loan will be very helpful because he’ll be able to improve his business and his quality of life.  The challenges he faces are frequent: competition and pests.  His dream is to buy more land and plant more.  In his free time he enjoys playing sports, especially volleyball.

loans.use: to buy seeds and farming supplies.

loans.name: Enriqueta Carolina

texts.es:
Enriqueta carolina tiene 51 años de edad vive en unión libre tiene dos hijos, vive con el esposo y con los hijos de 22 y 19 años de edad en Chillanes provincia de Bolívar.

LA VRC MONTE DE LOS OLIVOS, se encuentra ubicada en la parroquia San José del Tambo a 60 minutos de la oficina conformada por 14 socios y socias. Esta Ventanilla se dedica a Labores Agrícolas de ciclo corto Siembra de maíz, naranja y cacao.

Enriqueta se dedica a la agricultura a la siembra de maíz, naranja y cacao las compras y las ventas las realiza en el Cantón Chillanes. Solicita el Crédito para comprar semillas, insumos agrícolas como urea, mata monte, fertilizantes, veneno para la maleza para mantener en buenas condiciones los cultivos.
El Crédito será de mucha ayuda porque podrá mejorar la calidad de vida. Los desafíos que se le presenta  muy frecuentes son: la competencia y las plagas. El sueño es tener un camión  grande para transportar el maíz para venderlo.
En los tiempos libres le gusta  compartir momentos con la comunidad hacer reuniones para beneficio de la comunidad.
texts.en:
Enriqueta Carolina is 51 years old and living in a common law relationship.  She has two children.  She lives with her husband and children who are 22 and 19 years old in Chillanes Canton, Bolívar Province.

The “Monte de los Olivos” communal bank is located in San José del Tambo Parish sixty minutes from this office.  It has 14 members, men and women.  This communal bank is dedicated to short cycle corn, orange and cocoa bean farming.
