Con el crédito solicitado el busca poder surtirse mejor, y comprar dulces al por mayor, ya que llegan las fiestas en el municipio, y sabe que necesita estar preparado para la cantidad de turistas que llegan y que desean probar sus deliciosos productos.
texts.en:
Deiby is a hardworking man who is looking for ways to move his wife and two daughters forward despite the poverty that has defined their lives.

In search of an income that would permit him to support his household and the education of his small ones, Deiby assembled a small stall in Nariño Park where he sells sweets and cell phone minutes.

With the loan he has requested he will be able to stock his business better and buy sweets wholesale since the holidays are on the way in the city and he knows that he needs to be prepared for the large number of tourists that come and want to try his delicious products.

loans.use: to increase his merchandise inventory.

loans.name: Martha

texts.en: Martha is 26 years old and lives in west point. She is single and has three children aged 2 to 8 years old. For the past three years, she has been selling eggs, bread, and soft drinks near the market. She is requesting a loan to purchase eggs by the cartoon, bread, and soft drinks for her business. She likes her business because of the way her customers buy. She plans to become a big businesswoman.

loans.use: to purchase eggs by the carton, bread, and soft drinks for her business.

loans.name: Wilson Dario

texts.es:
A sus 32 años de edad Wilson, hombre emprendedor, nos cuenta como aprendió el arte de la costura de la mano de su hermana, la cual fue su maestra y apoyo.

Así las cosas comenzó a confeccionar su linea propia de prendas de vestir, con lo cual logra generar ingresos para su sostenimiento y el de su pequeña de tan solo 9 años de edad.

En la temporada de fin de año busca poder generar un mayor nivel de producción, dado que en esta época el potencial de ventas es mayor, y por lo tanto se encuentra esperanzado en generar mayores ingresos. Por tal motivo quiere poder comprar más insumos y materia prima para desarrollar su actividad.
texts.en: At 32 years old Wilson, an entrepreneur, tells us how he learned the art of hand sewing from his sister, who was his teacher and support.  So he began to make his own line of clothing, with which he manages to generate revenue for his livelihood and that of his daughter who is only 9 years old.  At year-end, he looks for the ability to generate a higher level of production, since at this time, the potential for sales is greater, and therefore, he is hoping to generate more income. For this reason he wants to be able to buy more supplies and raw materials for his work.

loans.use: Purchase supplies and raw materials.

loans.name: Mayra Narcisa

texts.es:
Mayra tiene la edad de 52 años, se dedica a la  venta de ropa nueva y cosmeticos, su condicion de vivienda es muy humilde, y es por tal razon, esta optando al credito, en donde tiene mas facilidad de pago, y equilibrar sus gastos.
Hoy en dia cuenta con el apoyo de su unica hija, que vive con ella, ya que los otros dos viven independiente, siendo madre soltera .
Lo que hara con este nuevo prestamo, es cambiar el techo hasta donde ajuste con el material a comprar, en laminas de zinc, cuartones de madera, clavos ya que tiene que ir por parte, para poder ajustar, ya que su solicitud va conforme a su disponibilidad de pago. Siendo su  meta, junto a su hija, el poder hacer esta mejora que es de gran necesidad habitacional.
texts.en:
Mayra, age 52, sells new clothing and cosmetics. The condition of her home is very modest. For this reason, she has elected to secure a loan because the payments are very convenient and will help even out her expenses. Today she has the support of her only daughter who lives with her. Her other two children are independent. Mayra is a single mother.

This new loan will be used replace the roof, so Mayra will buy materials such as sheets of zinc, wood beams, and nails. The loan amount on her application was adjusted based on her ability to repay. Along with her daughter, Mayra has established a goal of completing this improvement since it is a great need in their home.

loans.use: to purchase construction materials for replacing the roof of her house.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy building supplies

loans.name: Espérence Augustine

texts.fr:
Cliente de 47 ans, celibataire et mère de 2 enfants dont l'age varie 12 et 22 ans,elle ouvre son salon en 2007, très connue dans son quartier pour ses qualités de coiffeuse, elle a des stratégies efficaces pour fidéliser sa clientèle.
Elle n'a pas connu de défauts de paiements, elle a rembourse ses differents prêts avec succès et a des épargnes remarquables.
Avec ce présent prêt , elle va acheter un nouveau casque,des lots de mèches,des filets , des tissages, des defrisants et des pots de démêlants, des produits de manucure et pédicure et des produits et les produits de maquillage.Elle est très enthousiaste, quand elle témoignage de ce que Hope a fait pour elle,en une année comment sa situation financière, économique et sociale a complétement changée
Elle a déjà agrandie son salon de coiffure, a ajouter du nouveau matériel.Tres persévérante, elle a pour ambition d'ouvrir un autre salon de coiffure et s'occupe valablement de la scolarité de ses enfants.
texts.en:
This client is 47 years old, single, and has two children aged between 12 and 22.  She opened her salon in 2007.  She is very well known in her neighborhood for her skills as a hairdresser.  She has some efficient strategies for creating loyal customers.

She hasn't missed any of her repayments.  She has repaid her different loans successfully and has made remarkable savings.

With this current loan, she will buy a new hairdryer, hair extensions, hair nets, hair weaves, hair straighteners, tubs of conditioner, manicure and pedicure products and make-up products.  She is very enthusiastic when she sees what HOPE have done for her and how her financial, economic and social situations have completely changed over the course of one year.  She has already expanded her hair salon and added new material.  She is a very persevering woman and her ambition is to open another hair salon and take care of her children's education.

loans.use: to purchase beauty products such as conditioner, gel, face cream and manicure / pedicure products

loans.name: Sandra Carolina

texts.es:
La señora Sandra tiene 26 años y vive en la aldea de Quimistan. Junto con su esposo Milton, tienen dos hijos, uno de 8 y el otro de 1 año de edad. Milton trabaja de operador en una maquila. 

Sandra decidió convertirse en micro-empresaria debido a la necesidad de aumentar el ingreso familiar y obtener una mejor calidad de vida. Inició un negocio de venta de ropa usada con un pequeño ahorro que tenía y con el apoyo de su esposo. Sin embargo, había mucha competencia en este sector y doña Sandra cambió su actividad a la elaboración de papitas y chicharrones para poder sacar más ganancias. Solicitó un préstamo anterior para invertir en el negocio y logró aumentar las ventas y ganar mejores ganancias. Ella trabaja duro todo el día elaborando y vendiendo su producto. 

Con este préstamo actual de L10,000, Sandra comprará papitas y chicharrones para la venta. Ella espera seguir trabajando en su negocio para seguir apoyando a su familia.
texts.en:
Sandra is 26 years old, and she lives in the village of Quimistan.  She lives with her husband, Milton, and their two children, ages eight and one.  Milton works in a factory.

Sandra decided to become a small businesswoman due to the necessity of increasing the family income and obtaining a better quality of life.  She started a business, selling used clothes, with a little savings that she had and with her husband’s support.  However, there was a lot of competition in this area, and Sandra changed her business activity to making potato chips and “chicharrones” (fried pork rinds).  She did this in order to be able to get more income.

She previously requested a loan to invest in the business.  She managed to increase sales and to get better income.  She works hard all day making and selling her product.

Sandra will use this loan for 10,000 lempiras to buy potato chips and chicharrones to sell.  She hopes to continue working in her business in order to continue supporting her family.

loans.use: to buy potato chips and chicharrones.

loans.name: Deysi Argentina

texts.es:
La señora Deysi, tiene 35 años de edad, vive con su compañero de vida y sus cinco hijos.
Ella es una mujer muy trabajadora, que lucha por sacar adelante a sus hijos, y ayudar a su compañero de vida, quien trabaja como jornalero, ganando $50 dólares semanales, pero ese dinero no es suficiente para cubrir todas las necesidades básicas de su familia. Deysi se dedica a la crianza de ganillas indias y al engorde de cerdos, estos los vende cuando surge alguna emergencia o necesidad. Las gallinas las vende en un 100% en el mes de diciembre de donde obtiene buenas ganancias.
Deysi conoce muy bien su trabajo, ya que lo ha realizado desde niña, proviene de una familia muy humilde y de esa manera la crecieron sus padres y fue de ellos que aprendió este trabajo. De esta forma colabora en su hogar y no descuida a sus hijos.
Los materiales que utiliza para crecer a sus animales, una parte la compra al crédito en una ciudad, ella tiene la ventaja que su compañero de vida a parte de trabajar como jornalero, cultiva maíz y ese lo utiliza, para alimentar a sus animales. Ellos son una pareja luchadora y se ayudan mutuamente, ella le proporciona dinero de la venta de las gallinas y cerdos, cuando necesita comprar abono y él la ayuda proporcionándole el maíz.
Deysi solicita el préstamo a Fundación Campo, para comprar: 5 cerdos, 3 sacos de concentrados para cerdos, 2 quintales de concentrado para gallinas, 2 libras de clavos, 8 laminas y 4 cuartones de madera; para hacer una galera, para que no se asoleen los cerdos. 
El préstamo le ayudara a obtener mejores ingresos, que le permitan ofrecer a sus tres hijos menores el estudio, ya que los dos mayores no continuaron por razones económicas, también obtendrá los insumos, para alimentar a sus animales y vender más cantidad de estos. Además ya no comprara al crédito los insumos. Una parte de las ganancias la ahorrara para el estudio de sus hijos, por eso ella lucha sin descansar, para preparar aunque sea a uno o dos de sus hijos.
Ella espera tener una granja de cerdos y gallinas muy fuerte, obtener más ganancias para sacar adelante a su familia y brindarles a sus hijos una vida digna, para que no tengan las mismas necesidades que ella pasó cuando era una niña.
texts.en:
Señora Deysi is 35 years old and lives with her partner and their 5 children. She is a very hardworking woman who is determined to get ahead with her children and help her partner, who works as labourer earning $50 a week. However, this is not enough money to cover the basic needs of the family. Deysi raises Indian hens (type of chicken) and fattens pigs. These are sold when there is an emergency or need. She sells 100% of her hens in December and obtains a good profit. 

Deysi does this work very well as she has been doing this since she was a girl. She comes from a humble family and her parents raised her this way. It was from her parents that she learned this job. In this way she can contribute to the household as well as not neglect her children.

She buys on credit in the city some of the materials she uses to raise her animals. She has the advantage that her partner, as well as working as a labourer, plants corn which she uses to feed her animals. They are a determined couple who mutually help each other. She provides him wiith money from the sale of the hens and chickens when he needs to buy manure and he helps her by providing corn. 

Deysi is asking the Fundación Campo for this loan to buy: 5 pigs, 3 sacks of concentrates for the pigs, 2 quintals (1 quintal equals 100lbs) of concentrate for the hens, 2 pounds of nails, 8 sheets and 4 timber scantlings to make a covering so the pigs are shaded. 

The loan will help her obtain a better income which will allow her to give her 3 children an eductaion, as the 2 eldest were unable to continue with their studies due to economic reasons. She will also obtain the consumables needed to feed her animals and sell more of these. In addition she will no longer buy the feed on credit . She will save part of the profits for her children's schooling, something she fights for tirelessly, to prepare if it be only 1 or 2 of her children.

She hopes to have a strong chicken and pig farm, obtain more profits to raise her family and give her children a decent life so that they don't suffer the same necessities that she did as a child.

loans.use: to buy 5 pigs, 3 sacks of concentrates for the pigs, 2 quintals of concentrate for the hens, 2 pounds of nails, 8 sheets and 4 timber scantlings to make a covering so the pigs are shaded.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy pigs.

loans.name: Yassah

texts.en: Yassah is 33 years old and lives in west point. She is single and has three children aged 6 to 13 years old. For the past two years she has been selling biscuits in her community. She is requesting a loan to purchase more biscuits for her business, so that she can make more profit and have more customers. She plans to build a house and educate her children.

loans.use: To purchase more biscuits for her business.

loans.name: Kangni

texts.fr:
Kangni est un homme âgé de 33 ans. Il est célibataire et n’a pas d’enfants.
Kangni travaille comme tourneur depuis 2000. Il a une entreprise afin de répondre à la demande de sa clientèle
Kangni a requis son premier crédit de WAGES afin d’acheter et d’installer du moulin à courant.
texts.en:
Kangni is a thirty-three year old man. He is single and has no children.
Kangni has worked as a lathe operator since 2000. He has a business in order to respond to the demands of his clients.
Kangni requested his first loan from WAGES in order to buy and install an electric mill.

loans.use: to buy an electric mill.

loans.name: Zenabo

texts.fr:
Mme ZENABO est mariée et mère de 02 enfants. Le plus âgé a 12ans et le moins âgé a 09ans. Les 02  vont à l’école. Elle a 05 personnes en charge.

Elle vend des pagnes  depuis 09ans. Elle s’approvisionne au  marché du secteur 10 Ouagadougou. Ses clients sont les voisins, les agents des différents services de la ville de Ouagadougou.

Elle veut s’acheter  un quart (1/4) de balle de pagnes.

Mme économise pour améliorer son activité. Elle ambitionne construire sa propre boutique et aider son mari dans la scolarisation de ses enfants.
texts.en:
Zenabo is married and the mother of 2 children, who are 12 and 9 years old. She has 5 people in her care.

 She has sold traditional wraparound garments, “pagnes”, for the past 9 years. She stocks up at the market in Ouagadougou’s 10th Sector. Her customers are her neighbors, who also provide various services in the city of Ouagadougou. 

She wants to buy a quarter (1/4) bale of pagnes. 

Zenabo is saving up to improve her business, and aspires to build her own store and to help her husband in their children’s schooling.

loans.use: to buy a quarter (1/4) bale of pagnes.

loans.name: Anonymous
loans.use: to buy general food products
